body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Mutavault in play but without boosting Faeries yet it still gains +1/+1 and is unblockable?
I'm not familiar with this card, so maybe it really is supposed to be this all powerful? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [clayton....@ymail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115389003795609959110/)
title: Mutavault - can't block and it gains power?

comments.body:
Mutavalt gains all creature types when activated so it is affected by effects like "Other Faerie creatures you control get +1/+1"

**Status:** Invalid
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body:
Yes, I understand the faerie part, not the unblockable part. 
Are you saying it is all creatures EVER in existence at the same time, or only those on the board?
There was nothing on the board that was unblockable. 
But if everything then it's protection from all colors, regenerates, flying, trample, vigilance, etc?
comments.author: [clayton....@ymail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115389003795609959110/)

comments.body: It is not all creatures, it gains all creature types. So it is considered a bear, an angel, an ape, a giant, etc. I'll look into why it was unblockable.
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body:
As far as I can tell, Mutavault shouldn't be unblockable. A similar land that does become unblockable when animated is Creeping Tar Pit. 

Was Mutavault always unblockable? 

I noticed there was a point the AI attacked with two Mutavaults, was it unblockable at that point?

Later on the AI attacked with a single Mutavault, was it unblockable then?
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body:
Memory only here, but I think so far I have never been able to block a Mutavault in any situation and I have played against that a few times. But my apologies as this is only memory.

Btw, love the game and thanks for your quick attention to these things. I submit notes, not to complain, but to help in debug.
comments.author: [clayton....@ymail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115389003795609959110/)

comments.body:
I'll double check on whether Mutavault can be blocked.

Thanks for the support! Any report is greatly appreciated as it is a good chance for us to get feedback from the community.

**Status:** New
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: I'm playing against it right now and I can block mutavault, so now I can't determine what situation was the problem. Thanks for checking though.
comments.author: [clayton....@ymail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115389003795609959110/)

comments.body:
I'll close this issue for now, do create a new one if the unblockable Mutavault appears again. If possible, do try to post a screen shot of the game as it happens.

**Status:** CantReproduce
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
